name: eventmgr-ui-simulator
description: An Event Manager for simulate frontend

scripts.build:css:signin: sass style/src/signin.scss style/dst/signin.css --no-source-map && postcss style/dst/signin.css -o style/dst/signin.css
scripts.build:css:login_signin: sass style/src/login_signin.scss style/dst/login_signin.css --no-source-map && postcss style/dst/login_signin.css -o style/dst/login_signin.css
scripts.build:css:style: sass style/src/style.scss style/dst/style.css --no-source-map && postcss style/dst/style.css -o style/dst/style.css
